name: Dont Wake Up! - LDJam 50 Version
description:
Errors: Chrome Browsers are not supportet :(

Download Link at the Bottom! Don't Wake Up!

Dreaming about pink clouds and candy cotton? But what is that?! Work is calling, and you can already hear the alarm clocks? In Don't Wake up you want to delay the inevitable waking up and search for the alarm clocks that want to ring you out of your sleep. But what is that, is your dream slowly changing?!

Play with headphones Controls
  • Walk with W, A, S, D
  • Run with SHIFT
  • Jump with SPACE
  • Look with Mouse

This is made for the LudumDare50 - Jam Competition with the theme "Delay the inevitable".

 Best Played as Windows Build!

Team
  • AR @Swordmage
  • Dominik Giesriegl
  • Samir Riecke @Swipish
